website_summaries.verdict: PTFE gas range protectors that are easy to use, clean, and reuse. Choice of black or silver to match most ranges.
pros: Features pre-cut openings that can be trimmed for a customized fit
cons: Material is on the thin side, so the longevity of these protectors is questionable
Some users gripe about them looking "cheap

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be trim
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the chance to experienced how easy it would be to clean, but I’ll update my review when I do. But let me start by saying that I love the look. I wish i would’ve bought the black instead, but i love the silver ones too. I highly recommend the product to anyone trying to keep their stove clean. Be aware your need to cut it to you stove size, so it might not be as easy to install as i thought, but it is worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace my old stove burner covers. The price is good. Not sure but I feel this one seems to be more durable than my previous ones. It is also easy to clean. I shared 4 of 10 with my friend and she also loves it. The instruction is clear enough in the safety aspect. So far I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: MH. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and looks awful on our stove
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap feeling, and they looked horrible on our kenmore stove. We probably will end up throwing them away since they are so awful looking.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought theses after having the most difficult time trying to scrub my stove after a spill. They were amazing fits perfectly came in a great timeframe and were very affordable. Easy to clean with one tontwo wipes and nothing seems to stick to it when cleaned immediately. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: AYS

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: Very cool mats. I can't believe that it is fireproof. This is mind blown. Anyways, it keeps my ordinary stove clean. They are easy to cut and easy to wash. Rinse it with water and stuff just comes off. I could put it right back without the need to dry them. Pretty awesome! Cleaning could never been easier.
customer_reviews.author: SharkBytes

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but not great execution. My burner surface is larger than the provided squares. There's gaps and space between. It wasn't easy to install either. It had to be cut for the burner AND the edge for my sloping surface to the grate. Each and every piece had to be cut differently and cleaning means you have to replace them once at a time. Removing them for cleaning also dumps all the crumbs on your clean surface.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Lynn

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! These are terrible I returned them. You have to be a master artist to fit these on your stove and they are definitely not to be used “out of the box”.
customer_reviews.author: Kerron morain Donna juliemango

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.! Don't buy.!
customer_reviews.text: Overall as a material isn’t very bad but installation is so hard because you have to measure an then you have to cut, even if you cut correctly it doesn’t fit your oven will be dirty after using it. So dont need to get it, I think waste of money.!
customer_reviews.author: 🦋 Angela 🦋

customer_reviews.title: Just wipe clean
customer_reviews.text: I received 12 in my order. I cut them as instructed and they fit perfectly with an overlap in the middle of the stove. At first, they looked pretty flimsy. I have been using them for three days. The spillover on the mats was extremely easy to clean. I just ran them over soapy water then wiped clean. After they dry you just place back on the stove. If has saved me a lot of cleaning. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Gale Bender

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to clean and protects the stove top. I bought this because my stovetop cast iron grill/skillet would leave brown hard to clean stains to the point where I would almost scrub the finish off it to clean the stove top. These not only protect the stove top perfectly, but they can also withstand the heat when using the grill/skillet.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Love these liners! I have a white glass cook top that is a everyday chore to keep clean and nice looking. I wish I had used these way before now. They clean off really easy with a wet sponge or cloth and can be used over and over again. Keeps my cook top glass clean of all cooking spill and mess. Made my kitchen clean up a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer to cleaning your stove!
customer_reviews.text: These last a long time and make cleaning the stove so much easier. They clean easy they don't burn. I have a black stove. If you've never had one don't buy one they're the hardest to clean without streaking. These have made the chore of cleaning my black stove so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: L. Justin

customer_reviews.title: can't use them, don't fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure they work great but I wouldn't know bc they dont fit my stove at all. Waste of money and its too late for me to return them. I was saving them for when I got my new stove so I didn't open them right away. Thats my fault. But they seem to be good for completely flat stovetops. Mine dent down.
customer_reviews.author: Sophine718

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use,  washable and durable!  Can't go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they were super easy to install, no more cutting tin foil. They are easy to wash, and durable. My mom has been using tin foil for years and these are absolutely perfect. They are just what we needed, everything is already cut out and if they get dirty you can wipe down easily out wash it and put back on. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Saiz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the item since I had to cut it to the size of the stove range, as you can see I can’t cut. I don’t feel safe when the flames first turn on. It seems it could catch on fire. I want my money back... feeling sad. I will use it in another way which is placing it on my counter top like a mat to cut up my onions, limes, lemons etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help control mess
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely practical, keep mess easy to clean, I would buy them again. The only problem I had was cutting the inside where the burners go, it was not that easy. 2 came out great, one too small and when I fixed it, too big, and the other 2, too big also. Next time I will have to come up with a better way of doing this. Still, they work and I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Korner

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: These are abolutely essential for keeping your stove safe from food splashes and spills. They are nice thick and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is a breeze now
customer_reviews.text: I had to trim them just a tad to fit my stove, but, these are amazing. Game changer. My fiancé can not cook without half the food ending up beneath the burner, on the burner...and it takes forever to clean it up. Not anymore! Should have bought these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Products is worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Products is worth purchasing. Great product! Washable and easy to use! Help me a lot! Fit perfectly on my stove.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet B. SayMo

customer_reviews.title: Color is nice.
customer_reviews.text: A little hard 2 cut the burner hole 2 the right size. But looks nice on a black stove.
customer_reviews.author: Janet O.

customer_reviews.title: Use in gas cooktop around burners for easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I use on my black gas cooktop to keep clean. You need to cut to fit. They wipe off or rinse off for East clean. If you use a scrubby pad you will remove the black coating.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Keep the stoves clean
customer_reviews.text: Stove covers are very sturdy and are helpful to keep the stove clean. A couple of covers came torn. It is easy to clean and reuse. It fits the stove size perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Yahoo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and cut them as needed. It took 15 minutes or so to set them up. I'm not sure how easy they are to clean though. I will probably just throw in new ones once every 3 months. But definitely still easier than cleaning the stove myself..
customer_reviews.author: Jojojoshua

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We are a military family and move every few years. We put these in every place we live and makes cleaning so much easier and protects the stove for when we move out.
customer_reviews.author: Sharareh

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased a few times over the years, bu that doesn't mean they don't last a long time, as they do. They are easy to cut for exact fit. They are easy to remove, clean and replace. Work great on out black, gas, range top.
customer_reviews.author: Tile Tool Jim

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter. She used for a week then tossed them in a drawer. She said they were ill fitted and frustrating. The idea was great.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J. Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Stove burn covers
customer_reviews.text: I saw these burn covers and had to buy because my husband is such a messy cook and is constantly scrubbing the stove top. I haven’t been able to find an exact match for our stove. We had to trim them quite a bit before using them. They are pretty thin, I thought they would be thicker. These are easy to clean but I thought they would look better.
customer_reviews.author: M.Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning easier
customer_reviews.text: I got this to simplify cleaning around the burners. I no longer have to scrub off diffucult to remove burnt on food. Just lift these off with a quick wipe or wash...all clean, even if you miss a day, or two. The most difficult part was to cut these to fit the stove. Not difficult, just does not look as good custom fitted pieces, but it should get easier.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Havent tried cleaning it as yet. However. This was very easy to install. I have different sizes burners and the product worked for all sizes. Also the product is fire resistant as stated.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They make cleaning up my stove extremely easy. Just remove, wash, dry and put hem back on.
customer_reviews.author: Tubby

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: Not a good size. Warning about flame. Since it is on the stove, that did not make sense. All in all, not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Siggy Tesfaye

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent burner protection. Work very well, more than halve your cleaning time. They are durable and easy to clean in the dishwasher. I recommended them to all my friends. Easily customizable, very nice thick material. Super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean just the cutting to size is a bit of a hassle but overtime Happy it does what it’s suppose too
customer_reviews.author: Mitta

customer_reviews.title: Not good product
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a pungent smell at first use. Will fall back to silver covers
customer_reviews.author: Rohit kumar chaudhari

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: We have a six burner stove, and two teens. They overlap on our stove, but better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Farley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical purchasing this. But after it arrived and I placed it on my stove, I really liked it. I am very happy with this product and highly recommend it! Now cleaning my stove is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mahnoor Shahzad

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it
customer_reviews.text: Looks like crap. It’s like a piece of fabric that just sits on top. Not fitted and ugly
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: I assumed the covers were magnetic. The dirt seeped threw bigger mess than before I used the covers. The material is like plastic folders.
customer_reviews.author: Alma D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Practical Thing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased similar item from a catalog before, the same price only for 4 of these and the quality and thickness was half of this. Definitely recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.author: artimis

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: They work well. I just toss them when they're done
customer_reviews.author: Jeacat

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to clean and maintain your stove clean
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little hard to get an Exact fit, but they keep your stove very clean and they clean easily
customer_reviews.author: G-Ramz

customer_reviews.title: Easy Fit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut to fit. Just barely even show on my black stove. Look great, easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: It needed cutting to fit my stove but overall pretty easy to do. I just spilled milk while it was boiling and the clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Urooj

customer_reviews.title: Dd
customer_reviews.text: This product is good I wish they had better ones and more thicker ones.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Best Stove Burner Covers
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a variety of burner covers and these are the best. They are thick enough to hold shape and clean easily. Makes my stove top look new and you can't tell it is a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: Just use aluminum foil. These are not safe if you accidently burn them. Their fumes are poisonous.
customer_reviews.author: Saleem

customer_reviews.title: Great stove covers
customer_reviews.text: These stove covers are great. I love the color as it matches really well with my stove. The quality of the product is also good I never liked using those cheap aluminum foil covers. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: N Khan

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used for the stove, definitely better than just placing aluminum paper there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make my stove look so much nicer
customer_reviews.text: easy to cut to size, lay flat, makes my old stove look like new
customer_reviews.author: Lindley

customer_reviews.title: No more scrubbing
customer_reviews.text: This product has made my life so easy , if I have a spill it catches it and then I just remove it and wash . No more scrubbing . Heavy duty and durable
customer_reviews.author: Jenny U

customer_reviews.title: Great value and protection of stovetop!
customer_reviews.text: These protectors come very large so you can fit to size. I have international students who don't grasp the concept of cleaning up after themselves, so these have saved my stovetop from baked on messes!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shiroff

customer_reviews.title: Stove protector
customer_reviews.text: This are great. Keeps stove clean and easy to cut and customs fit . You won’t be disappointed a must have for your stove !
customer_reviews.author: Tzet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply to stove
customer_reviews.text: I just got this burner covers for my stove you have to cut them to the size of your burners that would take a few minutes easy to apply just dont cutted to close to the burner or it will burn..Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Marlene De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked exactly as advertised. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tessarn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and was packaged well. Easy to cut and keeping my stove clean!
customer_reviews.author: Tina C

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had them on my stove for months and they still look great!! Super easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: These are good burner covers. I had low expectations, but they are good quality and easy to cut to get the right fit. Would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Not  durable.
customer_reviews.text: after couple of used. It ripped a part. Wont buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy if specifications meet your measurement
customer_reviews.text: I believe it is specific to certain gas range not for mine and k had tough time using them. Since these are non returnable I have to keep them in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Not handy or easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t fit properly on the stove and I wasn’t able to use it since they don't stay flat on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Amna Salman

customer_reviews.title: Works great...saves time and effort in cleaning stovetop
customer_reviews.text: Saves lots of time cleaning stove top...easy to use and install..
customer_reviews.author: Pat L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the product for the price. Easy to cut and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Flores

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ur gas clean from greasy things.
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. not sure why I found it so late.
customer_reviews.author: UMANG CHHBBER

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before buying
customer_reviews.text: To be completely honest these are crap. Made our stove look horrible and barely fit. They feel super cheap but they are flame proof like they say they are. Giving 3 stars because you get 10. For some stoves you’ll have extra spare sheets. Another reason for the 3 stars is because I’ll probably find a way to use these for something else. They’re honestly reasonably priced but they just didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Ayoub

product_meta.title: Stove Burner Covers, Reuseable Gas Range Protector Stove Top Liners With Double Thickness, Non-Stick, Easy To Clean (10-Pack)
feature_bullets: MADE OF HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: These square burner covers are made of a fiberglass composited PTEE which is a non-toxic, teflon coated material that fully protects the stovetop against dripping and spilling the ingredients you are using gas stove burner liners is also crafted for the Long run, made to resist and withstand any challenges.
NON-TOXIC & SAFETY — BPA free, 100% satisfaction, Reusable, PFOA free, Can also be used safely in the dishwasher, STOCKYFY Gas Stove Burner covers are non-toxic and safe with anti-corrosion function.

CUSTOMIZE FOR YOUR STOVETOP: Stove burner covers 10.6” x 10.6” with pre-cut inner radius, you can easily trim them to fit your stovetop. Cut your Stove Burner Cover with scissors to fit your gas range and put them on. No more scrubbing of stubborn stains .You can find the instructions for making your size suitable for your gas stove are included in our package.

EASY TO CLEAN & USE: STOCKYFY burner cover is Reusable do not throw it away when the surface is dirty. It is fully reusable on both sides, and can also be easily removed and washed by hot soapy water and reuse them like new!

HEAT-RESISTANT: Our Gas Range Protectors has heat resistance up to 500°F and will not melt or burn. stove guard stove top protector is a practical tool to keep your stove clean and reduce the time to clean the kitchen. life guarantee and environmentally friendly. (PLEASE NOTICE THAT THESE COVERS ARE NOT FIRE RETARDANT. THESE WILL BURN IF TOUCHED BY THE FLAME AT THE CENTER OF STOVE)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars337 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
